name: BoneMarrowTransplant
title: Bone Marrow Transplant
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a bone marrow transplant.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent bone marrow transplants.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
